jsonld.name: Trust Gaps Benchmarks for Shopify Beauty Stores
jsonld.description: Performance benchmark data for 40 Shopify stores in the beauty and cosmetics industry, measuring trust gaps.

acceptedAnswer.text: Trust Gap Score measures the difference between what shoppers expect and what your store delivers in terms of trust signals. Lower scores indicate better alignment with customer expectations.

mainEntity.name: Why does Trust Gaps matter for beauty stores?

acceptedAnswer.text: Beauty products are personal and often expensive. Shoppers need ingredient lists, authentic reviews with photos, dermatologist endorsements, and clear return policies for products that may not work for their skin or preferences.

mainEntity.name: What is a good Trust Gaps for Shopify beauty stores?

acceptedAnswer.text: Based on Boostra's analysis of 40 Shopify beauty stores, the median trust gaps is 1. Top-performing stores in this niche (top 10%) achieve 0. A score of 0 means perfect trust alignment, while higher scores indicate gaps that may hurt conversion rates.

mainEntity.name: How can I improve my beauty store's Trust Gaps?

acceptedAnswer.text: Add authentic customer reviews and ratings prominently on product pages. Display trust badges, security seals, and payment icons clearly. Include detailed shipping and return policy information. Show real-time inventory and social proof (e.g., 'X people viewing'). For a personalized analysis of your store's specific issues and opportunities, consider a professional CRO audit.

mainEntity.name: How does my store compare to other beauty stores?

acceptedAnswer.text: You can compare your trust gaps against our benchmarks. If your score is better than 1 (the median), you're in the top half of beauty stores. If you're better than 0, you're among the top 10% performers in your industry.
